019package org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker;
020
021import freemarker.template.Configuration;
022import freemarker.template.SimpleScalar;
023import freemarker.template.Template;
024import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
025import freemarker.template.TemplateExceptionHandler;
026import freemarker.template.TemplateMethodModelEx;
027import freemarker.template.TemplateModel;
028import freemarker.template.TemplateModelException;
029import java.io.IOException;
030import java.io.OutputStream;
031import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
032import java.io.Serializable;
033import java.io.StringWriter;
034import java.time.Instant;
035import java.util.Collections;
036import java.util.HashMap;
037import java.util.List;
038import java.util.Locale;
039import java.util.Map;
040import java.util.MissingResourceException;
041import java.util.ResourceBundle;
042import java.util.concurrent.Future;
043import java.util.regex.Pattern;
044import org.jdrupes.httpcodec.protocols.http.HttpResponse;
045import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
046import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
047import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
048import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.HandlerDefinition.ChannelReplacements;
049import org.jgrapes.http.Session;
050import org.jgrapes.io.IOSubchannel;
051import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.AbstractConlet;
052import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleSession;
053import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.RenderSupport;
054import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ResourceByGenerator;
055import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConletResourceRequest;
056import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConlet;
057import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequest;
058import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequestBase;
059import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConsoleWeblet.LanguageInfo;
060
061/**
062 * 
063 */
064public abstract class FreeMarkerConlet<S extends Serializable>
065        extends AbstractConlet<S> {
066
067    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.VariableNamingConventions",
068        "PMD.FieldNamingConventions" })
069    private static final Pattern templatePattern
070        = Pattern.compile(".*\\.ftl\\.[a-z]+$");
071
072    private Configuration fmConfig;
073    private Map<String, Object> fmModel;
074
075    /**
076     * Creates a new component that listens for new events
077     * on the given channel.
078     * 
079     * @param componentChannel
080     */
081    public FreeMarkerConlet(Channel componentChannel) {
082        super(componentChannel);
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Like {@link #FreeMarkerConlet(Channel)}, but supports
087     * the specification of channel replacements.
088     * 
089     * @param componentChannel
090     * @param channelReplacements the channel replacements (see
091     * {@link Component})
092     */
093    public FreeMarkerConlet(Channel componentChannel,
094            ChannelReplacements channelReplacements) {
095        super(componentChannel, channelReplacements);
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * Create the base freemarker configuration.
100     *
101     * @return the configuration
102     */
103    protected Configuration freemarkerConfig() {
104        if (fmConfig == null) {
105            fmConfig = new Configuration(Configuration.VERSION_2_3_26);
106            fmConfig.setClassLoaderForTemplateLoading(
107                getClass().getClassLoader(), getClass().getPackage()
108                    .getName().replace('.', '/'));
109            fmConfig.setDefaultEncoding("utf-8");
110            fmConfig.setTemplateExceptionHandler(
111                TemplateExceptionHandler.RETHROW_HANDLER);
112            fmConfig.setLogTemplateExceptions(false);
113        }
114        return fmConfig;
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * Creates the request independent part of the freemarker model. The
119     * result is cached as unmodifiable map as it can safely be assumed
120     * that the render support does not change for a given web console.
121     * 
122     * This model provides:
123     *  * The function `conletResource` that makes 
124     *    {@link RenderSupport#conletResource(String, java.net.URI)}
125     *    available in the template. The first argument is set to the name
126     *    of the web console component, only the second must be supplied 
127     *    when the function is invoked in a template.
128     * 
129     * @param renderSupport the render support from the web console
130     * @return the result
131     */
132    protected Map<String, Object> fmTypeModel(RenderSupport renderSupport) {
133        if (fmModel == null) {
134            fmModel = new HashMap<>();
135            fmModel.put("conletResource", new TemplateMethodModelEx() {
136                @Override
137                @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals")
138                public Object exec(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") List arguments)
139                        throws TemplateModelException {
140                    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
141                    List<TemplateModel> args = (List<TemplateModel>) arguments;
142                    if (!(args.get(0) instanceof SimpleScalar)) {
143                        throw new TemplateModelException("Not a string.");
144                    }
145                    return renderSupport.conletResource(
146                        FreeMarkerConlet.this.getClass().getName(),
147                        ((SimpleScalar) args.get(0)).getAsString())
148                        .getRawPath();
149                }
150            });
151            fmModel = Collections.unmodifiableMap(fmModel);
152        }
153        return fmModel;
154    }
155
156    /**
157     * Build a freemarker model holding the information associated 
158     * with the session.
159     * 
160     * This model provides:
161     *  * The `locale` (of type {@link Locale}).
162     *  * The `resourceBundle` (of type {@link ResourceBundle}).
163     *  * A function `_` that looks up the given key in the web console 
164     *    component's resource bundle.
165     *  * A function `supportedLanguages` that returns a {@link Map}
166     *    with language identifiers as keys and {@link LanguageInfo}
167     *    instances as values (derived from 
168     *    {@link AbstractConlet#supportedLocales()}).
169     *    
170     * @param session the session
171     * @return the model
172     */
173    protected Map<String, Object> fmSessionModel(Session session) {
174        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
175        final Map<String, Object> model = new HashMap<>();
176        Locale locale = session.locale();
177        model.put("locale", locale);
178        final ResourceBundle resourceBundle = resourceBundle(locale);
179        model.put("resourceBundle", resourceBundle);
180        model.put("_", new TemplateMethodModelEx() {
181            @Override
182            public Object exec(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") List arguments)
183                    throws TemplateModelException {
184                @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
185                List<TemplateModel> args = (List<TemplateModel>) arguments;
186                if (!(args.get(0) instanceof SimpleScalar)) {
187                    throw new TemplateModelException("Not a string.");
188                }
189                String key = ((SimpleScalar) args.get(0)).getAsString();
190                try {
191                    return resourceBundle.getString(key);
192                } catch (MissingResourceException e) { // NOPMD
193                    // no luck
194                }
195                return key;
196            }
197        });
198        // Add supported languages
199        model.put("supportedLanguages", new TemplateMethodModelEx() {
200            private Object cachedResult;
201
202            @Override
203            public Object exec(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") List arguments)
204                    throws TemplateModelException {
205                if (cachedResult == null) {
206                    cachedResult = supportedLocales().entrySet().stream().map(
207                        entry -> new LanguageInfo(entry.getKey(),
208                            entry.getValue()))
209                        .toArray(size -> new LanguageInfo[size]);
210                }
211                return cachedResult;
212            }
213        });
214        return model;
215    }
216
217    /**
218     * Build a freemarker model for the current request.
219     * 
220     * This model provides:
221     *  * The `event` property (of type {@link RenderConletRequest}).
222     *  * The `conletId` property (of type {@link String}).
223     *  * The `conlet` property with the conlet's state (if not `null`).
224     *  * The function `_Id(String base)` that creates a unique
225     *    id for an HTML element by appending the web console component 
226     *    id to the provided base.
227     *    
228     *
229     * @param event the event
230     * @param channel the channel
231     * @param conletId the conlet id
232     * @param conletState the conlet's state information
233     * @return the model
234     */
235    protected Map<String, Object> fmConletModel(
236            RenderConletRequestBase<?> event, IOSubchannel channel,
237            String conletId, Serializable conletState) {
238        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
239        final Map<String, Object> model = new HashMap<>();
240        model.put("event", event);
241        model.put("conletId", conletState);
242        if (conletState != null) {
243            model.put("conlet", conletState);
244        }
245        model.put("_id", new TemplateMethodModelEx() {
246            @Override
247            public Object exec(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") List arguments)
248                    throws TemplateModelException {
249                @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
250                List<TemplateModel> args = (List<TemplateModel>) arguments;
251                if (!(args.get(0) instanceof SimpleScalar)) {
252                    throw new TemplateModelException("Not a string.");
253                }
254                return ((SimpleScalar) args.get(0)).getAsString()
255                    + "-" + conletId;
256            }
257        });
258        return model;
259    }
260
261    /**
262     * Build a freemarker model that combines {@link #fmTypeModel},
263     * {@link #fmSessionModel} and {@link #fmConletModel}.
264     *
265     * @param event the event
266     * @param channel the channel
267     * @param conletId the conlet id
268     * @param conletState the conlet's state information
269     * @return the model
270     */
271    protected Map<String, Object> fmModel(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
272            ConsoleSession channel, String conletId, Serializable conletState) {
273        final Map<String, Object> model
274            = fmSessionModel(channel.browserSession());
275        model.put("locale", channel.locale());
276        model.putAll(fmTypeModel(event.renderSupport()));
277        model.putAll(fmConletModel(event, channel, conletId, conletState));
278        return model;
279    }
280
281    /**
282     * Checks if the path of the requested resource ends with
283     * `*.ftl.*`. If so, processes the template with the
284     * {@link #fmTypeModel(RenderSupport)} and 
285     * {@link #fmSessionModel(Session)} and
286     * sends the result. Else, invoke the super class' method. 
287     * 
288     * @param event the event. The result will be set to
289     * `true` on success
290     * @param channel the channel
291     */
292    @Override
293    protected void doGetResource(ConletResourceRequest event,
294            IOSubchannel channel) {
295        if (!templatePattern.matcher(event.resourceUri().getPath()).matches()) {
296            super.doGetResource(event, channel);
297            return;
298        }
299        try {
300            // Prepare template
301            final Template tpl = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate(
302                event.resourceUri().getPath());
303            Map<String, Object> model = fmSessionModel(event.session());
304            model.putAll(fmTypeModel(event.renderSupport()));
305
306            // Everything successfully prepared
307            event.setResult(new ResourceByGenerator(event,
308                new ResourceByGenerator.Generator() {
309                    @Override
310                    public void write(OutputStream stream) throws IOException {
311                        try {
312                            tpl.process(model, new OutputStreamWriter(
313                                stream, "utf-8"));
314                        } catch (TemplateException e) {
315                            throw new IOException(e);
316                        }
317                    }
318                },
319                HttpResponse.contentType(event.resourceUri()),
320                Instant.now(), 0));
321            event.stop();
322        } catch (IOException e) { // NOPMD
323            throw new IllegalArgumentException(e);
324        }
325    }
326
327    /**
328     * Specifies how to render web console component content using a template.
329     */
330    public static class RenderConletFromTemplate extends RenderConlet {
331
332        private final Future<String> content;
333
334        /**
335         * Instantiates a new event.
336         *
337         * @param request the request
338         * @param conletType the conlet type
339         * @param conletId the web console component id
340         * @param template the template
341         * @param dataModel the data model
342         */
343        public RenderConletFromTemplate(RenderConletRequestBase<?> request,
344                String conletType, String conletId, Template template,
345                Object dataModel) {
346            super(conletType, conletId);
347            // Start to prepare the content immediately and concurrently.
348            content
349                = request.processedBy().map(procBy -> procBy.executorService())
350                    .orElse(Components.defaultExecutorService()).submit(() -> {
351                        StringWriter out = new StringWriter();
352                        try {
353                            template.process(dataModel, out);
354                        } catch (TemplateException | IOException e) {
355                            throw new IllegalArgumentException(e);
356                        }
357                        return out.toString();
358
359                    });
360        }
361
362        @Override
363        public Future<String> content() {
364            return content;
365        }
366    }
367}
